title: User Authentication and Security Framework
summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication and robust data protection.
description: Design and implement a comprehensive security framework that supports multi-factor authentication for user login, strong encryption for data in transit and at rest, and session management for secure access control. Ensure compliance with banking regulations and industry security standards to protect sensitive customer information and prevent unauthorized access.

title: Personalized User Dashboard
summary: Develop an adaptive dashboard that displays personalized banking services and products.
description: Create a customizable user dashboard that consolidates all relevant banking information and services based on customer profiles and eligibility criteria. The dashboard should serve as the user’s main hub to view accounts, track requests, and access personalized offerings while providing actionable insights through an intuitive and well-structured interface.

title: Responsive Portal Design and Cross-Device Compatibility
summary: Ensure seamless and consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Develop a responsive front-end design architecture that dynamically adjusts layout and interfaces for various devices. Focus on performance optimization, accessibility compliance, and maintaining a consistent look and feel across all platforms. This will ensure customers can securely manage their banking needs anytime, anywhere, through any device.

title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification
summary: Enable digital account opening and service update workflows for users.
description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing banking services directly through the portal. Incorporate real-time data validation, guided tooltips, and seamless integration with backend systems to improve accuracy and reduce processing time. Focus on minimizing the number of steps required for task completion.

title: Document Upload and Draft Saving Functionality
summary: Allow document uploads and saving of incomplete applications.
description: Develop capabilities for users to securely upload identification and supporting documents as part of their applications or service modification requests. Include a draft-saving function that enables users to pause their process and return later to complete submission, ensuring unsaved progress and documents are securely retained in encrypted storage.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Updates
summary: Deliver real-time updates and email alerts about request progress.
description: Implement a notification engine that provides real-time status updates on submitted account or service requests. Include automated email alerts and in-portal notifications triggered by specific events or status changes. Ensure that users can view progress in an accessible updates section within their dashboard for continuous process transparency.

title: User Activity and Interaction History
summary: Maintain a comprehensive log of all user interactions and transactions.
description: Develop an activity tracking system that records all user submissions, modifications, and interactions within the portal. This system will provide users with a searchable history of their transactions and serve as an auditable record for regulatory compliance, operational transparency, and user dispute resolution.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Connect the portal with existing core banking infrastructure for real-time synchronization.
description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core systems to facilitate secure bidirectional data flow. This includes synchronizing customer details, account information, and transaction records in real-time while maintaining high availability, integrity, and synchronization accuracy across connected systems.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a separate, optimized database to support portal operations.
description: Design a high-performance database optimized for the portal’s operations. It will handle user data, workflow management, caching, and document storage independently from the core banking database. Implement redundancy, indexing optimization, and backup recovery processes to ensure reliability, performance, and scalability of all portal functions.

title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
summary: Implement secure access controls for users based on defined roles and permissions.
description: Introduce a role-based access control (RBAC) model that manages user authorization for portal features according to predefined roles, such as retail customers, corporate clients, and administrative staff. Enforce strict segregation of permissions to ensure that users only access functionalities and data relevant to their profile and authorization level.
